dcterms:description: MELD is a dataset for emotion recognition in conversations, consisting of over 1400 dialogues and 13000 utterances from the TV series Friends, with each utterance labeled with one of seven emotions: Anger, Disgust, Sadness, Joy, Neutral, Surprise, and Fear.
dcterms:title: MELD

dcterms:creator: Carlos Busso
Murtaza Bulut
Chi-Chun Lee
Abe Kazemzadeh
Emily Mower
Samuel Kim
Jeannette N Chang

Shrikanth S Narayanan
dcterms:description: IEMOCAP is an interactive emotional dyadic motion capture database designed for emotion recognition tasks, containing recordings of actors performing scripted and improvised dialogues.
dcterms:title: IEMOCAP

dcterms:creator: Yanran Li
Hui Su
Xiaoyu Shen
Wenjie Li
Ziqiang Cao
Shuzi Niu
dcterms:description: DailyDialog is a manually labeled multi-turn dialogue dataset that covers various topics and emotions, providing a rich resource for training dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: DailyDialog

dcterms:creator: Sayyed M Zahiri
Jinho D Choi
dcterms:description: EmoryNLP focuses on emotion detection in TV show transcripts using sequence-based convolutional neural networks, providing a dataset for analyzing emotional content in scripted dialogues.
dcterms:title: EmoryNLP
